Standard Format
Your delivery address and ZIP Code™ are checked for proper Postal Service format and standardized if necessary.
For example:
Entered:
ABC Movers
1500 East Main Avenue, Suite 201
Springfield, VA 22162
Standardized:
ABC MOVERS
1500 E MAIN AVE STE 201
SPRINGFIELD VA 22162-1010
